description: This is a test suite for the YouTubeKnowledgeBase class, testing its loading and querying capabilities with various scenarios including synchronous and asynchronous operations, multiple and single URLs, and empty URL list. It uses pytest for testing and mocks a vector database.

methods.name: setup_vector_db
methods.description: Fixture that sets up a temporary LanceDb instance for testing, generating a unique table name and cleaning up after tests.

methods.name: test_youtube_knowledge_base_directory
methods.description: Tests loading multiple YouTube videos into the knowledge base and querying it synchronously.

methods.name: test_youtube_knowledge_base_single_url
methods.description: Tests loading a single YouTube video into the knowledge base and querying it synchronously.

methods.name: test_youtube_knowledge_base_async_directory
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading multiple videos and querying the knowledge base.

methods.name: test_youtube_knowledge_base_async_single_url
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading a single video and querying the knowledge base.

methods.name: test_youtube_knowledge_base_empty_urls
methods.description: Tests behavior when loading with an empty URL list.
